events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but would like to return it because it does not fit as expected. Please advise on the refund process.
The reported issue has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for returning the purchased jacket.
Support agent Emily has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request regarding the jacket return.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I'm here to assist you with your jacket return and refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in original condition for the refund?
My order number is 789654123. The jacket is brand new and still in its original packaging, unworn and unwashed.
Thank you for the details. You can return the jacket within 14 days using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly.
That sounds perfect, thank you for the quick response! I look forward to receiving the return label.
The return label has been sent to your email address. Once we receive the returned jacket, a full refund will be processed promptly.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the return label and to see if you need any further assistance with the refund process.
Yes, I received the label and have sent the jacket back today. Thanks for your help throughout this process.
We have received the jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear back on your payment method within 5-7 business days.
Your refund case has been successfully closed. Please reach out if you have any further questions or concerns.
